bridge-type.label: Lib485 Bridge
bridge-type.description: The Lib485 bridge represents a single DMX universe connected via Lib485

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of bridge, format: address[:port]. Default port is 9020.

parameter.name: applycurve
parameter.label: Apply Curve
parameter.description: List of channels that should use LED dim curve. Format is channel[,channel, ...] or channel[/width].

parameter.name: refreshrate
parameter.description: DMX refresh rate in Hz (0=disable output)
